      • NeapolitanCard

        public NeapolitanCard(NeapolitanCardNumbers neapolitanCardNumber,
                      NeapolitanCardSuit neapolitanCardSuit)

        neapolitanCardSuit - The NeapolitanCardSuit enum value

      • NeapolitanCard

        public NeapolitanCard(java.lang.String num,
                      java.lang.String suit)
        Instantiates a new Neapolitan card from String values representing the card number and suit
        Parameters:
        num - String representing the number of the card, its value must be among the cardNumber values in NeapolitanCardNumber enum
        suit - String representing the suit of the card, its value must be among the cardSuit values in NeapolitanCardSuit enum
        See Also:
        NeapolitanCardNumbers, NeapolitanCardSuit

      • NeapolitanCard

        public NeapolitanCard(char num,
                      char suit)
        Convenience constructor, instantiates a new Neapolitan card from char values representing the card number and suit
        Parameters:
        num - char representing the number of the card, its stringified value must be among the cardNumber values in NeapolitanCardNumber enum
        suit - char representing the suit of the card, its stringified value must be among the cardSuit values in NeapolitanCardSuit enum
        See Also:
        NeapolitanCardNumbers, NeapolitanCardSuit

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representing the Card.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String representing the Card, format is the concatenation of a String representing the CardNumber and a String representing the CardSuit, with the same format produced by getCardNumber() and getCardSuit()

      • equalTo

        public boolean equalTo(Card nc)
        Returns a Boolean representing whether the Card is equal to the argument
        Specified by:
        equalTo in interface Card
        Parameters:
        nc - Instance of NeapolitanCard to be used for the comparison
        Returns:
        True if nc has the same type, suit and number, false otherwise
